mapper.select: SELECT ct.id,t.`name`,t.coupon_sum - t.use_num remain_num,ti.begin_time,ti.end_time FROM coupon_activity_coupon ct LEFT JOIN coupon t ON ct.coupon_no = t.coupon_no LEFT JOIN coupon_detail ti ON t.last_coupon_detail_no = ti.coupon_detail_no WHERE ct.activity_id = #{activityId}

SELECT t.id,t.coupon_no,t.`name`,t.coupon_sum - t.use_num remain_num,ti.begin_time,ti.end_time,ct.id activity_coupon_id FROM coupon_activity_coupon ct LEFT JOIN coupon t ON ct.coupon_no = t.coupon_no LEFT JOIN coupon_detail ti ON t.last_coupon_detail_no = ti.coupon_detail_no WHERE 1=1 AND ct.activity_id = #{q.activityId}
and ti.name like concat('%',#{q.name},'%')

SELECT t.id,t.coupon_no,t.`name`,t.coupon_sum - t.use_num remain_num,ti.begin_time,ti.end_time,case when ct.id is null then 'false' else 'true' end selected FROM coupon t LEFT JOIN coupon_detail ti ON t.last_coupon_detail_no = ti.coupon_detail_no LEFT JOIN coupon_activity_coupon ct ON ct.coupon_no = t.coupon_no AND ct.activity_id = #{q.activityId} WHERE 1=1 AND t.shop_no = #{q.shopNo}
and ti.name like concat('%',#{q.name},'%')
